name: start_shipping_landing_page_tool
description: Generate a comprehensive plan for creating a modern, high-converting landing page. This tool will outline the structure, design elements, and content strategy to effectively showcase the product or service.

project_name.description: The name of the product, service, or campaign for which the landing page is being created

project_description.description: A detailed description of the project, including its purpose, target audience, unique selling points, and any specific goals for the landing page (e.g., lead generation, product launch, event promotion)

sections.description: Key sections to be included on the landing page, such as hero section, features, benefits, testimonials, pricing, FAQ, call-to-action (CTA), etc. Specify any unique sections relevant to the project.

design_style.description: The desired visual style and aesthetic for the landing page. Include preferences for color scheme, typography, imagery style (e.g., illustrations, photographs), and overall mood (e.g., professional, playful, minimalist, bold).
